content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    location_id,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dludemy.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2, 
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY location_id
    HAVING COUNT(1) > 1
